title: Foundations of Online Journalism: Practical Competency Development Through the Cognitive Apprenticeship Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic media literacy and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for novice journalism learners adapting to online environments post-COVID-19, combining large-scale real-time video classes with individual project-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can create news storytelling based on credible sources using online research skills
Learners can apply ethical frameworks when writing articles through peer feedback and instructor modeling
Learners can demonstrate the process of publishing multimedia articles using digital publishing tools (e.g., WordPress)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
